mt.name: Vibe FM
mt.description: Vibe FM was launched in July of 2009 with the aim of creating a positive on air experience through uplifting presentation and the world’s best Dance and R&B. Vibe FM has been successful in recruiting a number of Malta’s top on air talent. The station boasts a young, dynamic and creative team which includes personnel in administration, sales, production and programming.

mt.name: Radio Galaxy
mt.description: Radio Galaxy started broadcasting just after the turn of the millennium, in 2001, and became Radio Galaxy Network nine years later, in 2010. What had originally started out as just an FM radio channel broadcasting music has since become a 20 channel network consisting of a single FM network with an additional 19 digital channels on our web site.

mt.name: Fantasy Radio
mt.description: WFTZ came on the radio map in November of 1992 as a 3,000 watt FM station with offices located in Manchester and a tower that resides between Manchester and Tullahoma. In the 10+ years the station has been in existence, Fantasy Radio has seen some exciting changes and renovations and just recently has become a solid staple in the fabric of Coffee County events. Take a look.

mt.name: Spark Malta

mt.name: Calypso Ten 18
mt.description: We are Calypso Radio and we love what we do. Over the years Calypso Radio became an established name in Maltese households and businesses alike. Launched as a community station in 2004, and nationwide in 2005 Calypso Radio remains the nations favourite music station and aims at entertaining it’s audience not just through music but also by offering a warm and homely feeling to it’s listeners by it’s cheerful line up of presenters! Calypso Radio is Malta’s only Retro Music Station giving it’s priority to the massive decades of the 60’s, 70’s and the 80’s playing the greats such as ‘The Beatles’, ‘ABBA’, ‘BeeGees’, ‘Hot Chocolate’, ‘Lionel Richie, ‘Rod Stewart’, ‘Tina Turner’, ‘Air Supply’, ‘Percy Sledge’, ‘Duran Duran’, ‘Madonna’ and others… Italo Hits are certainly not absent, where an array of Italian music is played daily. Our music menu is never ending and this is the reason Calypso Radio remains Malta's favourite!

mt.name: All Rock Radio
mt.description: All Rock is Malta’s 24 hour digital rock station broadcasting on radio. All Rock plays a selection of classic cuts, album tracks and new sounds together with a variety of specialised programmes hosted by well seasoned and knowledgeable disc-jockeys. All Rock plays all kinds of rock sub genres, namely; hard rock, heavy metal ,folk and progressive rock , glam , punk, indie and alternative , psychedelia and blues. From AC/DC to ZZ Top including music from all the greats.

mt.name: Malta Sunshine Radio
mt.description: 24 hours a day with the best music from the 60's, 70s' 80s' 90s' 00s and today.

mt.name: Heart 94.3 fm
mt.description: Heart FM 94.3, the latest local radio station is formed by an expanding group of professional local Djs and Artists whose sole purpose is to paint everyone’s lives with various genres of music, entertaining many people having different styles, tastes and moods.

mt.name: Radio Malta 2
mt.description: Radju Malta 2 is a radio station in Malta. It is owned and operated by the Public Broadcasting Services of Malta: PBS Ltd.Broadcasting on 105.9 FM across the Maltese islands, it provides music programmes as well as cultural, scientific, artistic, environmental and educational focused programmes. Live coverage of debates in the Maltese Parliament are also broadcast. It previously operated under the names: Buzz FM, TEN-66 FM, Radju Parlament, Maltin Biss

mt.name: Unique Radio
mt.description: Basically this station is a van with a studio built inside , we can drive and transmit on the radio . This feature gave this radio opportunities to go were ever we like for example bays , farm houses , local feast and much more .
